topic.title: Lottery Winning Approach, Powerball, Lotto America, Lucky for Life, Lotto Max …
topic.body:
For the digit arrays in Powerball, there’re **2346 sets of 2-Digit Combo Patterns** in total. 

Then on each specific event, 
there’re **10 sets of 2-Digit Combo Patterns in each draw of Powerball (the first group of 5 white balls)**.

For example, the draw of 
2020-09-02		1	4	11	20	69	 \\ 18
consists of 10 sets of 2-Digit Patterns as below:
1,20/	11,20/	1,11/	4,20/	1,4/	4,11/	20,69/	1,69/	11,69/	4,69/	

Based on in-depth analysis, the mysterious 2-Digit Combo 
9,46 
is likely to appear in the coming events of lotto draws, since the last time for 9,46 is in the draw of many years ago:
2005-04-02	5	9	11	17	46

Recently, after a special cold set of 2-Digit Combo  
19,66 appeared for **the first time in Powerball's history.  **
2020-08-22	19	30	36	42	66

There are so many variations of digit combinations in Powerball number composition.  **It’s extremely difficult for human mind to analyze those digits**.  So computerized data analysis may help with better understanding of the digits changing trend.  

No one can predict the future. 
**Skilled analysis helps reduce errors.**

**By Sep. 2020, there are only 46 Combos left, some of them go near the maximum limit. **

Skip to the last section to see some special sets of very mysterious 2-Digit Patterns. 

The file can be downloaded at below special URL on Zeronet: 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CiXRY9ATZSoZqBzwMfXEMsKtPRt2aQoF2/data/users/1MLMJkrjAE8msexWjjjTnQPcSAZvoCanSJ/Lottery%20Winning%20Approach%20Powerball.pdf 

(Note: 
The URL with the special beginning http://127.0.0.1:43110  should be opened by Zeronet App  https://zeronet.io/, which is an innovation of web technology, without any censorship, even without SMS verification like Telegram, while using Bitcoin cryptography to enhance safety, which will be a new tide of cyberspace revolution. ) 


With the flooding of Coronavirus, many industries encounter extreme difficulties.  The lottery industry still seems to keep some vitality at unusual stage of history.  
**Those data may be helpful for some people who are sensitive to digits and numbers. **
